title: AI = The Death Of Essays? GOP’s Non-Platform 09.07.22
itunes:title: AI = The Death Of Essays? GOP’s Non-Platform 09.07.22
description:
In episode 1325, Jack and Miles are joined by creative and political activist Rafael Shimunov, to discuss… (Disgruntled Professor) These f**kers Are Using AI To Write Essays Now, Republicans Aren’t Even Sure What To Campaign On Anymore…, Fast Food Bowls Aren’t Going Anywhere and more!

  1. (Disgruntled Professor) These f**kers Are Using AI To Write Essays Now
  2. Fast Food Bowls Aren’t Going Anywhere
  3. Papa Johns Is Being Mocked For Creating Something Called The ‘Papa Bowl’ To Offset ‘Pizza Fatigue’
  4. Pizza Power Report 2022: Get Ready for the Robots
  5. Papa Johns’ new pizza bowls are bad execution of a bad idea
  6. Subway’s New Protein Bowls Are Basically Piles of Cold Cuts

  7. The Real Reason You Should Never Order KFC's Famous Bowl

LISTEN: Needs Deodorant by Mono/Poly

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
